item.title: New Advisory: RHBA-2005:324 - GFS bug fix update
item.description:
New Advisory: RHBA-2005:324 - GFS bug fix update
Release: ASYNC
Created by: Derek Anderson (danderso@redhat.com)
Bugs:
130358 - lock_gulm.o verbosity is not configurable
131142 - unable to select which interface to bind to from lock_gulmd
145121 - ccsd can get stuck on startup with zombie child
146672 - Node panic doing a writev()
150029 - Pool does not see all powerpath devices
150365 - gnbd init.d scripts needed
150366 - lock_gulm needs to start before gnbd_import and gnbd_export
Brew Builds:

item.title: Comment from Chris Feist (cfeist@redhat.com)
item.description: Email has been sent requesting packages to be GPG signed.

item.title: Comment from Jay Turner (jturner@redhat.com)
item.description: RHNQA looks good for GFS-6.0.2.10-0. Moving to HOLD.

item.title: Comment from Jay Turner (jturner@redhat.com)
item.description:
Latest U5 kernel is 2.4.21-32.EL, so looks like some work will be needed here.
Moving back to Assigned.

item.title: Comment from John Poelstra (poelstra@redhat.com)
item.description:
Looks like this errata is stale. Dropping to clear the queue. Please reopen if
you still need it
